Valid Values: ['Oryctolagus cuniculus', 'Gallus gallus', 'Sus scrofa', 'Rhesus macaque', 'Escherichia coli', 'Rattus norvegicus', 'Danio rerio', 'Mus musculus (humanized)', 'Drosophila melanogaster', 'Pan troglodytes', 'Homo sapiens', 'Mus musculus']

Label: Component
Description: Type of submitted information.

Label: resourceId
Description: A unique identifier for the resource.

Label: rrid
Description: The RRID, a standard resource identifier that will facilitate interoperability with other databases, and is an increasingly-used identifier for publications https://scicrunch.org/resources if available. Should include the 'RRID:' or 'rrid:' prefix.

Label: description
Description: Free text description/summary/overview/purpose of the resource.

Label: usageRequirements
Description: Any known restrictions on use of the resource.

Label: howtoAcquire
Description: How to acquire a particular resource.

Label: dateAdded
Description: The date that the resource was originally added.

Label: dateModified
Description: The last update of the resource metadata (not including observations).

Label: antibodyId
Description: A unique identifier for the antibody.

Label: synonyms
Description: Synonyms of the resource

Label: resourceName
Description: The “canonical” name of the resource

Label: mTARequired
Description: Whether a Material Transfer Agreement is required or not.

Label: animalModelId
Description: A unique identifier for the animal model.

Label: geneticReagentId
Description: A unique identifier for the reagent.

Label: cellLineId
Description: A unique identifier for the cell line.

Label: resourceType
Description: Type of resource. (e.g. animal model, antibody, plasmid, etc.)

Label: originYear
Description: The year the cell line orginated.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Origin Year" is required

Label: tissue
Description: The tissue the cell line is derived from.
Valid Values: ['Bone marrow', 'Dorsal root ganglion', 'Splenocyte', 'blood', 'Nerve tissue', 'Buccal mucosa', 'Optic nerve', 'Plasma', 'Primary tumor', 'Sciatic nerve', 'Unspecified', 'Whole brain', 'Serum', 'Buffy coat', 'Meninges', 'Embryonic tissue', 'Cerebral cortex', '']
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Tissue" is required

Label: donorId
Description: A uniqe identifier for donor.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" OR "Animal Model" then "Donor_id" is required

Label: populationDoublingTime
Description: Time for cell line to double
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Population Doubling Time" is required

Label: resistance
Description: List of compounds if a cell line has been selected for.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Resistance" is required

Label: contaminatedMisidentified
Description: If a cell line has been contaminated or misidentified
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Contaminated Misidentified" is required

Label: cellLineDisease
Description: TBD
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Cell Line Disease" is required

Label: cellLineCategory
Description: The category to which the cell line belongs.
Valid Values: ['Undefined cell line type', 'Hybridoma', 'Transformed cell line', 'Conditionally immortalized cell line', 'Telomerase immortalized cell line', 'Embryonic stem cell', 'Stromal cell line', 'Induced pluripotent stem cell', 'Factor-dependent cell line', 'Finite cell line', 'Cancer cell line', 'Somatic stem cell', 'Spontaneously immortalized cell line', '']
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Cell Line Category" is required

Label: strProfile
Description: Short tandem repeat profile information.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Str Profile" is required

Label: organ
Description: TBD
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Organ" is required

Label: modelofManifestation
Description: Manifestations/symptoms that this resource is used to model (e.g. tumor type, behavioral phenotype, etc.)
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Cell Line" then "Model of Manifestation" is required

Label: cloningMethod
Description: How the vector was constructed. (e.g. restriction enzyme, TOPO cloning, etc.)
Valid Values: ['Gateway Cloning', 'Gibson Cloning', 'Ligation Independent Cloning', 'unknown', 'Restriction Enzyme', 'TOPO cloning', '']
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Cloning Method" is required

Label: vectorType
Description: Primary function of the plasmid. (e.g. mammalian expression, bacterial expression, etc.)
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Vector Type" is required

Label: nTerminalTag
Description: Any tags on the N terminal 5' end of the gene insert in the plasmid. Only tags that are in frame
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "nTerminal Tag" is required

Label: bacterialResistance
Description: Antibiotic(s) that should be used for selection in bacteria. (e.g. ampicillin, kanamycin, etc.)
Valid Values: ['Tetracycline', 'Gentamycin', 'Spectinomycin', 'Chloramphenicol and Kanamycin', 'Hygromycin', 'Ampicillin and Bleocin (Zeocin)', 'Ampicillin and Kanamycin', 'Nourseothricin(clonNat)', 'Chloramphenicol and Bleocin (Zeocin)', 'Spectinomycin and Streptomycin', 'Kanamycin', 'Chloramphenicol and Gentamycin', 'Bleocin(Zeocin)', 'Chloramphenicol and Ampicillin', 'Streptomycin', 'Ampicillin and Spectinomycin', 'Ampicillin and Tetracycline', 'Chloramphenicol and Spectinomycin', 'Ampicillin', 'Other', 'Ampicillin and Streptomycin', 'Chloramphenicol and Tetracycline', 'Chloramphenicol', '']
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Bacterial Resistance" is required

Label: 3primer
Description: Primer to sequence the 3' end (C-terminal) of the insert.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "3primer" is required

Label: growthStrain
Description: The E.Coli strain that should be used to distribute the plasmid. (e.g. DH5alpha, NEB Stable, etc.)
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Growth Strain" is required

Label: insertSpecies
Description: Species of the insert
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Insert Species" is required

Label: 5primeCloningSite
Description: If Restriction Enzyme was selected as the cloning method, specifies what enzyme was used on the 5' (N-terminal) end of the insert
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "5prime Cloning Site" is required

Label: 3primeCloningSite
Description: TBD
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "3prime Clonin gSite" is required

Label: hazardous
Description: Does the unmodified plasmid DNA, either in purified form or when introduced into bacterial or mammalian cells require handling at Biosafety Level 2 or higher?
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Hazardous" is required

Label: vectorBackbone
Description: Name of the backbone the plasmid is built on. (e.g pGBT9)
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Vector Backbone" is required

Label: 5primeSiteDestroyed
Description: If 5' site was destroyed during cloning. (e.g. yes, no, unknown).
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "5prime Site Destroyed" is required

Label: insertEntrezId
Description: TBD
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Insert Entrez_id" is required

Label: backboneSize
Description: Size in bp of the backbone without the insert
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Backbone Size" is required

Label: insertName
Description: Name of the main gene insert in the plasmid.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Insert Name" is required

Label: totalSize
Description: Size of vector with insert. Derived from insertSize and backboneSize.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Total Size" is required

Label: 3primeSiteDestroyed
Description: If 3' site was destroyed during cloning. (e.g. yes, no, unknown)
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "3prime Site Destroyed" is required

Label: insertSize
Description: Size, in bp, of the gene insert as it is in the plasmid.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Insert Size" is required

Label: gRNAshRNAsequence
Description: The sequence of the gRNA or shRNA for the gene insert, if present.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "gRNA shRNA sequence" is required

Label: copyNumber
Description: If a plasmid produces a sufficient amount of DNA from a normal miniprep or if plasmid requires special growth conditions or it is difficult to grow. (e.g. high copy, low copy, unknown).
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Copy Number" is required

Label: selectableMarker
Description: Are there any additional selection markers on this plasmid, for example, any mammalian selection markers or fluorescent proteins?
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Selectable Marker" is required

Label: promoter
Description: Promoter driving the expression of the insert in the plasmid
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Promoter" is required

Label: 5primer
Description: Primer to sequence the 5' end (N-terminal) of the insert
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "5primer" is required

Label: growthTemp
Description: At what temperature should the bacteria hosting the plasmid be grown
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "Growth Temp" is required

Label: cTerminalTag
Description: Any tags on the C terminal 3' end of the gene insert in the plasmid. Only tags that are in frame
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Genetic Reagent" then "cTerminal Tag" is required

Label: generation
Description: The generation of the animal model. (e.g. 13)
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Generation" is required

Label: transplantationType
Description: TBD
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Transplantation Type" is required

Label: strainNomenclature
Description: The standard nomenclature for the strain. (e.g. B6.129S2-NF1tm1Tyj/J). Set by the International Committee on Standardized Genetic Nomenclature for Mice. See http://www.informatics.jax.org/mgihome/nomen/strains.shtml for nomenclature information.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Strain Nomenclature" is required

Label: animalState
Description: State the animal is in according to the vendor/developer. (e.g. embryo, sperm, live)
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Animal State" is required

Label: backgroundSubstrain
Description: The substrain is a particular variety of a strain. For example, a C57BL/6 mice may have a substrain of C57BL/6J, C57BL/6Tac, or another substrain.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Background Substrain" is required

Label: backgroundStrain
Description: An assigned name that describes the genetic make-up (all its alleles at all loci) except the mutated gene of interest and a very small amount of other genetic material, generally from one or two other strains. Correct strain nomenclature indicates what a mutant strain’s background is.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Background Strain" is required

Label: animalModelDisease
Description: TBD
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Animal Model Disease" is required

Label: transplantationDonorId
Description: The donor indentifier number for the transplantion donor.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Transplantation Donor_id" is required

Label: animalModelofManifestation
Description: Manifestations/symptoms that this resource is used to model (e.g. tumor type, behavioral phenotype, etc.)
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Animal Model" then "Animal Model of Manifestation" is required

Label: specimenFormat
Description: How the specimens have been processed in preparation for distribution.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Biobank" then "Specimen Format" is required

Label: specimenPreparationMethod
Description: The preservation methods used by the biobank.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Biobank" then "Specimen Preparation Method" is required

Label: tumorType
Description: The types of tumors that are banked, if applicable.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Biobank" then "Tumor Type" is required

Label: biobankId
Description: A unique identifier for the biobank.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Biobank" then "Biobank_id" is required

Label: biobankURL
Description: A URL for the biobank landing page.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Biobank" then "Biobank URL" is required

Label: diseaseType
Description: The diseases of the banked specimens, if applicable.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Biobank" then "Disease Type" is required

Label: specimenTissueType
Description: The types of tissues that are banked.
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Biobank" then "Specimen Tissue Type" is required

Description: TBD

Description: The types of specimens that are banked.

Valid Values: ['unknown', 'Polyclonal', 'Recombinant Polyclonal', 'Control', 'Recombinant', 'OligoClonal', 'Recombinant Polyclonal Secondary', 'Monoclonal Secondary', 'Recombinant Monoclonal Secondary', 'Cocktail', 'Isotype Control', 'Recombinant Monoclonal', 'Polyclonal Secondary', 'Monoclonal', '']
Conditional Requirements: If Resource is "Antibody" then "Clonality" is required

Label: Component
Description: Type of submitted information.

Label: chromosome
Description: Chromosome number of affected gene. (e.g. 11)

Label: mutationDetailsId
Description: A unique identifier for mutation.

Label: affectedGeneSymbol
Description: The gene symbol for the mutated gene. (e.g. NF1, SUZ12, SMARCB1, P53, etc.)

Label: affectedGeneName
Description: Gene name for the affected gene (e.g. neurofibromin 1)

Label: externalMutationID
Description: An identifier from an organism database such as MGI or other curated variant resource, if available.

Label: proteinVariation
Description: The protein consequence of the mutation described in sequence variations. (e.g. p.Asn58fs). See http://varnomen.hgvs.org/recommendations/protein/ for the Protein Variation nomenclature.

Label: alleleType
Description: The type of genetic alteration of the resource, vocabulary aligned with MGI allele subtypes.

Label: mutationMethod
Description: The method used to alter the resource, vocabulary aligned with and expanded upon MGI allele origin types.

Label: humanClinVarMutation
Description: The human equivalent, of the mutation being described in ClinVar/HGVS notation. Can be used to link animal model mutations to the mutation they are modeling in human disease.

Label: mutationType
Description: The type of the mutation, vocabulary aligned with MGI mutation types.

Label: animalModelMutation
Description: A description of the specific mutation(s) created in the genome. (e.g. A neomycin resistance cassette replaced the first 42 codons of exon 31, the exon 31 splice acceptor site, and approximately 2 kb of intron 30.)

Label: sequenceVariation
Description: Important sequence variations (e.g. g.123_127del). See http://varnomen.hgvs.org/ for the sequence variation nomenclature.

Description: Type of submitted information.

Description: A unique identifier for the resource.

Description: A unique identifier for the development of the resource.

Label: investigatorId

Label: funderId
Description: A unique identifier for the funder of the resource.
